title: Start
RumourShiba
body: The Shibas are proud of their reputation for being strong and independent.

title: Spring
body:
<<if $spring_talk==0>>
Player: What a lovely hotspring.

<<elseif $spring_talk==1>>
Player: I wonder how long it's been there?

<<else>>
Player: It looks like a bottomless hole.

<<endif>>

<<set $spring_talk += 1>>

title: Shop
body:
<<if $game_state == "start">>
[[Shop.Start]]
<<$game_state == "find cure">>
[[Shop.FindCure]]
<<elseif $game_state == "cure found">>
[[Shop.CureFound]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to cat">>
[[Shop.GaveSpellToCat]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to merchant">>
[[Shop.GaveSpellToMerchant]]
<<endif>>

title: Cat
body:
<<if $game_state == "start" or $game_state == "find cure">>
[[Cat.StartOrFindCure]]
<<elseif $game_state == "cure found">>
[[Cat.CureFound]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to cat">>
[[Cat.GaveSpellToCat]]
<<elseif $game_state == "gave cure to merchant">>
[[Cat.GaveSpellToMerchant]]
<<endif>>

title: Shop.Start
body:
<<if $shop_talk == 0>>

//if not spoken to shop yet then don't know who the merchant is
<<if $cat_talk == 0>>
Merchant: Welcome to my shop! What can I do for you? Need some items? Or maybe you want to sell something? I will give you a good price!

title: Cat.StartOrFindCure
body:
<<if visited("Cat.StartOrFindCure")==false>>
<<set $cat_talk to 0>>
<<endif>>

<<if $cat_talk==0>>
Player: What's this weird statue?
Cat: Could you please help me?
Player: Ahhh! This statue can talk?

<<if $game_state=="find cure">>
Player: How can I help you?
<<endif>>

Cat: I accidentally turned myself into a statue! 
Cat: I need some holy water to turn myself back, Can you help?

-> I..guess?
Cat: Thank you so much! I can't offer you any money unfortunately, but I owe you a favour!

-> How did you turn yourself into a statue?? <<if $game_state!="find cure">>
Cat: I don't know! I've never done anything like this before.
Cat: I turned flowers into cats, but everyone loved that!

-> I'm looking for some holy water myself! <<if $game_state=="find cure">>
Cat: Oh, that's great! You are so kind!

<<elseif $cat_talk==1>>
Cat: I'm not sure where to find it! Maybe near the temple?

<<else>>
Cat: Please help me!

<<endif>>
<<set $cat_talk+=1>>
